alert.note: Alert for Stillwater; Sweet Grass (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 10 at 2:38AM MDT until June 10 at 11:09PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM MDT EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of south central Montana, including the following counties, Stillwater and Sweet Grass. * WHEN...Until 400 AM MDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 234 AM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain from showers and thunderstorms that produced between 0.5 and 2 inches of rain over the area. The rain has since become lighter, but often times flooding continues for a bit after the heavy rain has tapered down. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Nye and Dean. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Do not drive on or attempt to cross flooded roads, find an alternate route. Roads and driveways may be damaged or washed out in places. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Flooding is occurring or is imminent. It is important to know where you are relative to streams, rivers, or creeks which can become killers in heavy rains. Campers and hikers should avoid streams or creeks.
